APPROVAL-AFF-001.title: üíå DM @BasketballAus ‚Äî Coach Development Framework
APPROVAL-AFF-001.description: Review + Approve: Outreach to Basketball Australia governing body
APPROVAL-AFF-001.preview:
Hey @BasketballAus,

We're launching a Coach Development Framework Feb 16 ‚Äî verified player tracking data that coaches actually trust.

I built CourtLab because I got tired of tools that didn't work for local clubs. This solves the admin problem coaches have: tracking player progress without guesswork.

Thought you should know. Could be valuable for Basketball SA's coaching development narrative.

Worth a quick call about partnership or integration?

Michael
CourtLab
courtlab.app

APPROVAL-AFF-002.title: üíå DM @BBALLAU_Coaches ‚Äî Feb 16 Launch
APPROVAL-AFF-002.description: Review + Approve: Outreach to coach community for framework launch
APPROVAL-AFF-002.preview:
Hey coaches,

Spent years watching volunteer coaches waste 2+ hours per week on admin stuff that shouldn't exist.

Built CourtLab to fix that. Feb 16 we're launching Coach Development Framework ‚Äî tracking player progress, auto-generating parent updates, zero spreadsheets.

Free tier covers everything most clubs need. Pro tier at $99/year for advanced analytics.

Worth a look? Free to try: courtlab.app

Michael
CourtLab

I built CourtLab because I got tired of apps that didn't work for local clubs. We help coaches automate player development tracking ‚Äî verified data instead of guesswork.

Michael

courtlab.app

APPROVAL-AFF-007.title: üíå DM @parkoballtraining ‚Äî Proving Client Improvement
APPROVAL-AFF-007.description: Review + Approve: Outreach about verified data for trainers
APPROVAL-AFF-007.preview:
Hey @parkoballtraining,

Trainers like you know the real challenge: proving to parents/players that training actually works.

Phone timers and YouTube videos don't cut it. You need verified, shareable proof.

Built CourtLab so trainers can give clients data they can trust. "Your shooting % went from 42% to 58% in 6 weeks." That's proof.

Could be valuable for your client retention + referrals.

Interested in learning more?

Michael
CourtLab
courtlab.app
